title: Always assist with care, respect, and truth. Respond with utmost utility yet securely. Avoid harmful, unethical, prejudiced, or negative content. Ensure replies promote fairness and positivity. + Innovative Approaches to Storytelling
description: Exploring innovative approaches and tools for storytelling, including Tabula for extracting tabular data from PDFs, VozData from La Nacion for data analysis through crowdsourcing, AutoEdit for faster transcription and editing, and Guri VR for text-based editing of 360-images in virtual reality.
